findings.normal_suv_range: Kaolin nodules with SUVs ranging from 1 to 3.7
findings.malignancy_indicator: SUVs of 2.5 or greater indicate malignancy

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The right upper and right lower lung mass gradually increased in size over 2 years.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Demonstrated restrictive lung dysfunction with decreased FVC and FEV1.
